source_text: I have been exploring and traveling through what you might think of as timelines, what you might think of as for a very long time in terms of how you perceive years in past, present, and future.

And in doing this type of exploration, it allows me to experience extraterrestrial civilizations from a variety of choices in terms of who they choose to be as individuals, as a society, This, then, for me is a great joy to explore, experience, and learn from other civilizations, other extraterrestrial beings, other worlds, other ways of life, other forms of experiencing the infinite, that we all are, unconditional love, that we all are.
I, in doing this, have developed the type of translation ability that affords me the ability then to speak with a variety of extraterrestrial civilizations in a language they can understand.

These are some, then, of the activities and functions for me that are fulfilling, that are a part of who I enjoy experiencing and sharing with others in other worlds and in my own Yahyel civilization.
Ever wonder if there's intelligent life elsewhere in the universe?
Well, I have....I've been wondering since I was a kid.
My name is Reuben Langdon.
And on March 29th 2007, in the middle of the day, I saw a number of strange objects in the sky.
Coincidentally, I was working on the film Avatar at the time, playing an alien.
And ever since then I've been on a quest...
A quest to find out if aliens really do exist and if so... ...are they here with us?
If beings of higher intelligence are here... ...what is their purpose?
Why don't they make themselves more known?
Why the secrecy?
I've asked these questions to many experts, yet each seems to have a different theory.
So I thought to myself, why not ask the aliens directly?
So that's what I set out to do!
Well, sort of...

Wonderful to be here with you in these blending moments to God, to have this opportunity to explore more of the infinite that we all are, more of the unconditional love that is all of our actual nature.
And with this in heart and mind, in what way would you most enjoy exploring together?
Oh.
Hi, Ishuwa.
I'd like to ask a few questions.
Very well.
First of all, I'd like to know a little bit more about yourself and your civilization.
Very well.
I am Ishuwa--
Yes.
--of the Yahyel civilization.
The idea, then, in brief brevity-- your and our civilization were at one time the same one civilization.
There were some in our world who chose to step out into space to explore new worlds, new creations, new evolutions, hybridizations of life forms.

And some of those who embarked on that co-creation from our civilization-- they, over eons and eons of your time in a sense, through the blending, through the hybridization through the evolving with other civilizations some quite different than ours but human, yes... ...have evolved and become your earth human civilization so you do, as the channel was mentioning earlier, you do each of you on Earth in the DNA of your human biology

all of you without exception born here on Earth have DNA that is then very much that of our civilization. The one in which you in a sense were part of before the time of stepping out into space to explore, to create new hybrid worlds.
So in that sense we are family.
We are human as you are.
There are variations in our physical appearance from those of you on your world.
We could walk amongst you and the variations wouldn't make you think necessarily we were from another world, perhaps just from a different part of your world you aren't familiar with in that way.
We are very different in our vibration, our consciousness, our sense of who we are.
Our knowingness of existence is quite different than that you have in your world at this timing.
We all know in that sense who we are.
We all support one another in all moments without hesitation, without question.
We are then supported by ourself and by all others in our civilization at all times without hesitation.
This is a wonderful-- a wonderment, a wondrous experience for us to be a part of.
This simply is the way we have chosen to co-create our experience together.
So it is no less or greater than that in your world's choices to choose as you have been doing, to be somewhat separate from the awareness of your actual nature.

So the idea then-- I have been exploring and traveling through what you might think of as timelines, what you might think of as for a very long time in terms of how you perceive years in past, present, and future.
But it isn't all that long in my experiencing, for I am able, as many of us are, to move about in time-- past, present, and future at rates that don't then take as long as you might think they would.

And in doing this type of exploration, it allows me to experience extraterrestrial civilizations from a variety of choices in terms of who they choose to be as individuals, as a society, how they choose to interact with other civilizations in their own worlds and on other planets, in other solar systems.

This, then, for me is a great joy to explore, and experience, and learn from other civilizations, other extraterrestrial beings, other worlds, other ways of life, other forms of experiencing the infinite, that we all are, unconditional love, that we all are.
This is of great excitement and fulfillment for me to do this.
I, in doing this, have developed the type of translation ability that affords me the ability then to speak with a variety of extraterrestrial civilizations in a language they can understand.
It is as though I am a translator in a sense for several extraterrestrial worlds, civilizations, beings, life forms.

These are some, then, of the activities and functions for me that are fulfilling, that are a part of who I enjoy experiencing and sharing with others in other worlds and in my own Yahyel civilization.

It is always a great joy to have opportunity to interact in that, then in your civilization to share and interact with those of your human experience in your current timeline, which is always changing in every moment.
There's a great joy for me to be able to interact with you.
So that is a little about me and the Yahyel civilization.
Did you have more around that-- you wanted to ask about?
Or was there another direction you would like to explore?
A few more questions in regard to this.

For when-- for interacting with other civilizations, do you also-- do they also have the same type of channeling mechanisms that we are using in this case and other-- specifically my series that I'm doing here is utilizing the channeling mechanism or techniques.
Some other civilizations do this, yes.
It is part, in a sense, of human biological ability.
There are different ways that the channeling can be done than what you are most familiar with experiencing.
But those will be more evident in time as those types of channeling capacities unveil themselves in your world's experiencing of them.
There are then other civilizations that simply choose not to interact in that capacity.
What would be-- if it's OK to share, what would be some of the other capacities?
Some do not speak at all.
Some are entirely, let's say, telepathic in a sense.
Some do not do that at all.
Some are very vocal.
They are very behavioral in their communication.
It is then to learn what their behavior is communicating in a sense.
That then is a very different type of communication.
It isn't necessarily as specific as words in telepathic communication can be.
In those types of transactions, interactions, communications with those behavioral communicators-- it can-- at first, interactions seem that the information is very vague.
Not much one can learn from that type of interaction.
However, giving it time, behavioral communication can be a little bit like those in your world who do sign language.
And so it can get to be very useful, very meaningful, very fulfilling in levels of great depth, and detail, and interlayerment in a sense.
And so that is another type of communication where channeling isn't really taking place-- behavioral communication.
Almost like how we interact with some animal species--
Yes.
--on our planet.
And there are then-- many of your animals do more of this.
Specific, like dolphins and apes?
And some people have telepathic communication with these animals, but--
They can with themselves as well.
Yeah.
I see.
I see.
Fascinating.
Is there any sort of technology, how we understand in our world with electronics, AI, and gadgets?
Is there any kind of gadget communication with other civilizations through your civilization?
Or is it more biological?
We do have some artificial constructs that in that sense convey communication.
Yes.
I see.

We recently had in our collective consciousness-- the US government had made-- brought to the awareness-- programs of studying UFOs and not fully announcing the UFO ET presence, but sort of coming close to sort of seed the collective.
I wanted to ask how you-- from your perspective, how you guys see this energy or this news affecting...
It can facilitate more of those in your world's willingness to accept this idea of extraterrestrial reality.
Has it sped timelines up?
Or is it early?
It can.
Yes, jump a little bit ahead, so to speak--
I see.
I see.
--in the way that is supported, so it can still be appropriate.
Right.
Many, many people on our planet say it's not enough.
They need to disclose more.
It has to come from within the individuals more, really.
And then they can feel more comfortable, in a sense, within what they are sharing.
They don't fully understand it themselves at this point, even though the understanding is contained within all of your DNA in a sense.
Not many of you have accessed to it yet, acknowledged its existence yet.
If it were to happen too fast, it would almost be counterproductive.

Yes, it is happening on a very organic rate in a sense, just as the seed grows into a tree that produces branches, leaves, flowers, and fruit, but then ripens in its appropriate, in a sense, organic timing in a sense.

And there are many factors involved in facilitating alignment with your civilizations, aligning in alignment with an organic unfoldment as though you're awakening to this ET reality is coming through as though it had come out of a seed and is growing, surfacing, breaking the surface of the soil, seeing the sunlight-- the light of day in a sense.
And in a sense, that is about as far as you've gotten in this analogy, with your growth at this point.
Beginning to break the surface, the seed of a plant, the tender growth process is occurring at that level in this analogy in a sense.
Well usually when we plant seeds, before it sprouts out of the ground is the longest time.
But once it starts to sprout, it comes very fast, so hopefully that's the case.
And in a sense, as more of you embrace this, you are like the sun giving light to this, that it may grow even faster, but all the while in its own appropriate rate.
It will not grow faster than it can.

There are times in your plant world, there are those who might try and accelerate the rate of growth of a particular plant, experimenting with it or not knowing, simply wanting to see if they can kick it into gear faster.

And there are then those in your world who do at times and will continue to try and accelerate the rate to even try and genetically alter it in a sense to be something other than that which they might perceive it would be if it were allowed to grow into its own tree and create its own fruit in a sense.
So there are some who would have an idea to try and genetically alter the outcome.

Again, there are many forces, factors, beings of high intelligence within the one that has the all-- that are very focused here with all that are in our interacting in this exchange of unfoldment, of these co-created realities to facilitate an alignment of how it unfolds in a sense.
And so that what is the final and in a sense result-- the fruit is very ripe for all involved human beings on Earth, human beings in our civilization, others who facilitate this.
For there are many that are part of the one that we and you all are one with.
So many factors that we maybe can't quite understand.
So we should just--
You can open-- invite to learn more about them-- won't need to know all of them.
Some will be very helpful to learn about.
Yeah, some very exciting to know about.
Some that you can, in a sense, stand beside and grow and learn from and with and share what you know, that they may learn from you as well in a sense.
Well, these interactions are quite informative.
So this is one way, I suppose.
Certainly.
You described earlier.
You described your civilization's physical appearance and maybe being quite similar to us humans.
The human physical appearance is so wide in its spectrum from different nationalities-- Asian, African, Spanish.
We have such a wide variety.
Is there such a variety in your civilization?
There is a variety potentially as wide, but generally not as wide.
But the potential is within the genetic framework.
Oh, I see.
We can mirror, given the characteristics of our physiology to those in your civilization at this time.
Would there be a density level that we could classify Ishuwa in his--
Fourth, fifth, and sixth, primarily, in interacting with your civilization at this timing.
OK, so for-- my understanding from that would be very close to an almost non-physical being, but still having a physicality, but close in the evolution.
Different than vibration of your physiology yes. Physical for me, all the same in my vibratory world.
And in that sense, you can easily adapt to our likeness.
Or other -- to adapt your physicality.
Is that sort of when you say you are mirroring?
There are those who are similar in physical characteristics in our world to those in your world, mirroring in that sense.
So those from Asia-- we have some in our world similar to that.
They would then mirror one another in that respect.
If they were in the presence of one another, they would mirror one another in that way.
I see.
There are those in your South America, in your continent of Africa, in your North America, in your European continents.
We have those in our world who would mirror those of your Earth humans in those regions as well--
I see.
--that the mirroring is the idea.
I see.
I see.
Similar.
We've heard a lot about the Yahyel civilization having-- or being the offspring of humans and the Zeta Reticuli beings.
Is there a relationship with what humans know as Grays or Zeta beings?
To my civilization?
Yes, to the Yahyel civilization.
There are some of our DNA within that, that you would think of as Zeta.
Not necessarily all of them contain some of our DNA.
They have varieties as well-- hybrid.
They have moved out and have some variation as well.
So many people have talked about interactions with their hybrid children.
And they talk in the sense of their understanding that their children are Zeta-human hybrids.
They can be.
Are there Yahyel-human hybrids?
Yes.
Oh, OK.

The Yahyel and the Earth humans-- one civilization that is, in a sense, being co-created from our and your collective consciousness through choice, our and your collective conscious level, super-conscious levels, choosing to co-create-- Yauaney civilization.
Yauaney.
The Yauaney.
Some Earth humans have hybrids in a sense that are Yauaney.
So would that be what collectively we're starting to understand-- the hybrid children?
Would that be a name of this race?
The Yauaney would be our--
Some of them are Yauaney
Yauaney.
Yauaney.
Some are.
Not all are.
There are then Earth humans who have connections to extraterrestrials from other civilizations, interacting with them in various ways.
And then they can have created some hybrid children with those extraterrestrial civilizations.
So we are not the only one interacting with Earth humans at this time.
Not just Zetas, not just Yahyel.
But we have Pleiadians.
We have Dracos.
We have Arcturians.
We have a whole big cosmic family and lots of offspring from that at some point.
Family.
Exactly.
Galactic family.
Yes, a variety of hybrid children are a part of this.
Do these children play together-- different races, different offsprings from different cosmic--
This can and does occur.
OK.
Does it--
Not to say that they are all aware of one another necessarily.
Oh, OK.
It said that the Phoenix Lights-- the big ship that sort of flew over Phoenix, Arizona--
A variety.
Yes, there were more than one.
Yes.
Oh, OK.
And I think it was in 1997 was --
Very powerful visual contact.
Yes.
Yes.
In a boomerang shape, isn't it?
Yes.
And a visual contact occurred.
And is this Yahyel civilization?
Primarily, this was of our co-creation with your civilization, although we were not alone in terms of extraterrestrial civilizations.

But it was primarily our civilization bringing a larger input into your awareness on a conscious level of our existence at a time and in a way that on a super-conscious level, your civilization knew about in advance, agreed to, co-created, understood, understands, can see what is occurring-- past, present, future timelines and understands the powerful, beneficial results and growth in positive, nurturing ways for all involved in that choice to have that come out, come through, evolve,
develop in that way.
Yeah.
Well, it still is a large imprint on the collective consciousness and continues to expand, so thank you.
Yes.
And there were others before, perhaps not as highlighted.
There were others since.
And there will be a variety of other ones coming.
The light forms will vary.
At times, they will not seem to come from a craft.
They will seem to be very organic in form, and shape, and coloration as though they are phenomena of space and time itself.
Yes.
Would you be able to name some of these other civilizations that you work with closely?
They are those you are most familiar with at this time in terms of the ones that are to focus and be aware of.
There are others.

Yes, but not to come through at this time, simply because you will then, through your own mechanisms, begin focusing and expanding your focus when truly focusing your focus will bring greater connection in a more heartfelt, intelligent way, allowing for clarity through simplification, focus.
Pleiadians-- yes.
There are certainly a variety of Pleiadian civilizations that have a very close contact, conversing, communication, co-creation, interrelation with our civilization.
Do you also share DNA from the Pleiadian civilization as we do?
There are-- yes.
In a sense, there is no end to this.
Yeah, it just goes forever.
Learning which then will be most applicable for you in unfolding a future and a present that you most enjoy fulfillingly, will then provide the greatest excitement for you.
Understand, then, to know that there are in a sense no end to the numbers to suggest that it is not finite, perhaps allows you to focus more on a finite number of them.
To know that there are an infinite number.
And in this physical embodiment, your awareness will not truly embody all of the infinite number of them nor need it do so.
Allow, then, to focus, to know the ones that are of greatest heartfelt support will find you as you open up and focus on those.
But reaching out to uncover new ones can be a joy to do, I understand.
Yes.
Do not let go of that explorative joys, if it is a joy for you to do that.
Yes, it is definitely a joy.
It's so expansive into--

It will guide you beyond that which you are aware or have heard of in terms of trying to create a family tree of sorts or a point of origination, for the point changes as you learn of the next one, and then changes as you learn of the next one.
Yeah, that seems to be the case, and that's exciting.
Yes, understand.
That's fun.
That's a lot of fun.
How would you describe, from your perspective, the angelic realms that we consider on our Earth plane?
They are non-physical beings that support Earth humans in your life here.
They can be thought of as angelic beings.
There are extraterrestrials who are in the physical form who support Earth Humans.
And Earth humans might not be aware of this coming from physical extraterrestrials who might then define their experience and communications as coming from angels or spirit guides.

So an extraterrestrial could be for someone on Earth, thought of as an angel or a spirit guide, even though they are physical, all the while then being some angels and spirit guides for an Earth human's experience are non-physical consciousnesses.

So it comes down to, then, which a person is connecting to, to decide or determine, is it a non-physical or a physical being that they are defining or experiencing as an angel, or a spirit guide, or communication with extraterrestrial?
And in your realm where you exist, do you work with-- I'm assuming you work as we do with a lot of these non-physical energies.
Yes, there are a variety of non-physical consciousnesses that support the matrix in a sense, the physical experience, the experience of physicality.

There are a variety of consciousnesses interacting that allow for the way we and you are experiencing physicality, that which holds what you experience as time and space in a sense, in a physical spectrum.
There are consciousnesses that are involved in this that have evolved to be more focused at doing that, that are in a sense, born to do that, in a sense, gifted at doing that.
It is their joy in a sense to be that support to live life, almost as if they are the substance that holds the physical experience of your life together.
Yes.
Conscious being.
So even, for example, a peach or an apple-- physical item you experience contains some of these conscious beings.
And this goes back to what Shaun and I were talking about earlier.
When we consume these consciousnesses, we're putting in what-- what you put out is what you get back.
Yes.
Now, what you put in, what you put out is what you get back or live within.
So having awareness of what types of consciousness we consume can help us in our external reality?

Yes, it is conscious energies and entities, beings, lifeforms that you are consuming in the food that you are consuming or the chemistry that you are consuming that is interblended with some of the foods or many of the foods that are constructed at this time that many people on Earth are eating, construction of synthetic and chemical consciousnesses with other types of organic consciousnesses.
And I'm assuming the constructor-- the cook, the preparer of these foods also puts in their own consciousnesses in the mix.
And then it becomes--
Certainly.
Thank you.
--a consciousness soup--
Yes.
--and can become quite tasty if you have a good one.
Very much so.
I see.
So what we're enjoying is not just the taste, but we're also enjoying all the other different consciousnesses that are-- go into that making of this wonderful creation we call like an apple pie or--
That can play a part in it.
Yes.
Wonderful.
Many of these civilizations have talked about a council of worlds, a sort of federation, a galactic federation.
There's many titles for this.
Are you part of...
We interact with those of extraterrestrial origin that, in that way, choose to come together and interact spontaneously to gather enjoyably, supportively to gather.
When one is no longer in a moment of joy, they will become focused on another venture or activity that is more exciting.
And they will move along.
They may come back at another time.
In this way, it is always an interaction of very positive communication and support.
We can give it names.
But it is free from friction and conflict that is imbued or envisoned in your televisions and that which is in the pan of vision of the theater and theatrical movie releases.
I see.
We sort of formulate our version of that idea and then--
Yes.
--put it into a context that we can understand--
Yes.
--in our specific timeline evolution.
So our interaction is friction free in that way.
We are not fighting.
We are not trying to commandeer some other civilization's desires and wishes to supplant our own.
There are no secret bodies within one or the other of these civilizations trying to take control of the whole body, so to speak.
I see.
That is an illusory reflection of beliefs that are illusory beliefs.
And we do not in that way contain those in our experience.
Very human construct.
Earth human, Yes.
Earth human.
Those that you have in your film and television-- Earth human constructs with beliefs that are illusory, illusory being out of alignment with your actual nature.
We understand our actual nature.
And therefore, the beliefs that which we put within and experience are in alignment with the actual nature of existence, of unconditional love, of the one that is the all, the all that is the one.
And because we know this and we put that out, we get back experiences in alignment with that.
It's that simple.
We know who we are.
We put out beliefs that are in alignment with who we are.
The one that is the all that we are.
And we get back experiences in alignment with that.
The infinite effortlessly creates together and co-creates interactions that are of this level of frictionless, non-friction interaction-- fun, fulfillment, friendship.
I understand.
Yeah.
There are people on our planet-- Shaun and myself who-- we were just talking earlier that we sort of live these rules.
We sort of live these ideas and are physically manifesting this sort of non-friction way of life.

But the human spectrum seems to be so great that Shaun and I can be having this experience of non-friction, yet on another side of the planet, there are others who still embrace this idea of friction.
I guess I'm saying is we have such a wide variety on Earth.
I'm curious to know the variety on the Yahyel civilization.
It sounds like it doesn't go to that extreme.
It is an infinite variety within the vibration of alignment with actual nature.
Earth alignment.
The Earth frictions are the result of putting out beliefs that are illusory, out of alignment with one's actual nature.
And thus, putting that out, they get back friction.
That is a choice within the infinite that can exist for an infinite period in a sense.
The infinite contains all that can be.
And that can include those who, currently through their upbringing and state of awareness, choose to create friction.
That can continue to exist within the infinite for an infinite amount of time.

The idea is you could choose to only experience the free from friction, that which is alignment with actual nature, that which is filled with an infinite number of ways to experience being in alignment with the joy.
The friction-free experiences are infinite in number, unlimited.
So each person has a choice and has the ability to choose.

Do they want to play around in the illusory beliefs that create the frictions or move off into the realm of unhindered joy and excitement in ways that are free from friction, that are fully fulfilling and fascinating, one moment to the next-- new, new, refreshing.
That they're in that realm-- are an infinite number of unlimited realities that can unfold now, and now, and now, it is a choice that you can make.

So as we move individually-- as we move into these non-friction realms, these infinite possibilities of joy and non-friction, will we begin to see less and less other people having friction and I guess--
Yes.
--in our realities as well?
Yes.
OK, so we attract those people who are also in that same vibratory rate.
Yes.
And the frictioners-- if that's a title, we can call them frictioners--
The frictioners.
--will become sort of less and less, until eventually there's just no frictioners left on the planet.
They will not be a part of your experience.
They will be too vibrational different.
I see.

You can and will in time, for it does exist-- a world, a Earth which all Earth humans are living and choosing to know who they are-- the free from friction experience where you all truly have an abundance of what you truly enjoy having, and are supporting and being supported by one another, supporting each other, and supporting yourself.
This is a reality that exists.
And you will in time be aware of it, because you will be focused and tuned in with it.
Much of your messages have been in that realm, in that space of saying, what you put out, which that-- the four laws that you exist is the one, is the all.
What you put out is what you get back.
And everything changes except for those first four or first three.
Different ways to say.
Yes, you exist here and now.
The one is the all.
The all is the one.
What you put out is what you get back.
Or what you put within is what you live within.
And everything is always changing, except those first ideas that I just mentioned--
Yes.
--you have mentioned.
Yes.
Those are not changing.
And so you can always utilize the understanding of those to create an ever-changing experience of the infinite, that you are perceiving yourself to be a part of it perhaps?
Being a part of unconditional love or existence here and now and putting out the one that you want to be experiencing that of.
Then you get back that one of the all that is the one.
In the way that you are most strongly choosing to put that out, you will get back.
You tune in.
You become in alignment with that existence, that experience, that vibratory reality.
Your ability to do this, then, never changes.
But how you do it will always change in a sense.
And that's sort of the secret sauce, the magic formula for what some would say law of attraction.
We have many titles and many different--
Yes, certainly.
--ways of creating our reality in this realm.
But that's a very simplified, direct, but yet, expansive way to put it.
So thank you for those wise words.

Talking about the consciousness of the peach and consciousness of the apple, and what we perceive as technology and artificial intelligence-- we're entering into a time on our planet where we're learning these concepts.
We're learning the intelligence behind physical manifestations.
And we're almost to this point-- we actually are to this point where we have computers now that we're talking to.
Can you-- from your perspective, how does this-- how do you interact with these forms of consciousnesses?
Well, in a variety of ways.
As you and your world are learning to do, we in our ultimate state will let go of all those types of constructions.
Yes-- and enjoy being, in a sense, unclothed in a sense, not wearing--
Oh, I see.
--any idea of technology and our experience in interacting with one another.
Oh.
As we have created phones, and devices, and these things, the Yahyel civilization doesn't have these types of--
We have some of these.
Yes, spacecraft and other forms of transportational ideas.
Yes, there are, in our experience, opportunities to have, let's say, a spacecraft with a variety of extraterrestrial civilizations interacting to gather.
This spacecraft provides a forum for a variety of extraterrestrial civilizations to be, to gather, to interact, to gather in that way, physically in a sense.
Ultimately, we let go of those in our deepest, most fulfilling interaction, in a sense, for life free from all such external creations of artificial intelligence in a sense.

We will let go of those and engage in interaction together, free of those and yet, we will take them on and interact with them in the timing that supports their function, for us to have a particular experience that they afford us to have that we would not have without them.
So we do enjoy having some of those.
Yes.
So almost-- I've always had the idea that the internet is an external mechanism, external creation for letting us humans connect to the idea that we're all interconnected.
Bringing you together as a single body, a single mind.
Right, which we're using in a technological form.
But ultimately, we're learning that we already have this connection without the internet.
Yes.
And now, you're learning the mind shares a heart together as well.
You're learning to live as one heart.
But we're using the internet to teach us something that we already have, kind of.
It is.
Because I'm going to put this video out to the internet for people to view and understand that, oh, we actually have--
For many, like an intermediary step in a sense.
Yes.
Yeah.
It is like training wheels on a bicycle in a sense.
Yes.
Yes, exactly.
And so as I was saying earlier, these interactions with artificial intelligence that we're now creating-- is it sort of training wheels for interacting with extra-dimensional intelligences?
It can be, for there are some that are interacting on that level.

There is consciousness in the information that is being conveyed with the computers-- There is conscious civilizations of a sense, of a type that are allowing to make it possible for the computer information to be shared-- the information itself.
It isn't just information.
It isn't just packets.
It isn't just ones and zeros.
It isn't just electrical pulses.
It is consciousness.
Right, as all intelligence.
Intelligence.
Yes, just like our peaches and our--
Yes.
--apples.
Many people are afraid.
Many people are afraid of the internet.
Many people are afraid of these artificial consciousness.
They fear it.
They demonize it.
What would you say to those people?
That is an aspect of the one that is the all that I am in a sense, that you are.
